errors.missing_required_argument: You didn't pass in all of the arguments, **use** `git --help` **for info.**

errors.missing_permissions: **You're missing permissions required to do this!** You need {0}
errors.no_private_message: This command can only be used **inside a server!**

what.title: What is stored?
what.body: The only data stored are your User ID and quick access users, repos and orgs.

use.title: How is all this used anyway?
use.body: It's used to provide storage for your saved users, repos and organizations, your User ID is essential for the Bot to know, what data is yours.

access.title: Who has access to this data?
access.body: Only the Bot's developer has access, no one else. Your data isn't viewed or accessed in any way unless it's required to provide the service.

deletion.title: How can I get rid of this stored data?
deletion.body: You can do that very easily by using the `git config -delete` command!

author.title: Who wrote this and can this be changed?
author.body: This privacy policy was written by [wulf](https://dsc.bio/wulf), the Bot's developer, and yes, all of this is subject to change in the future.

stats.title: Bot Stats
stats.body: General stats regarding the Bot's functioning.
